# z-thead



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

ZThead component.

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `isFocusable` | `is-focusable` | The element is focusable                                   | `boolean` | `false` |
| `sticky`      | `sticky`       | If true, the header will be stuck to the top of the table. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description              |
| ---- | ------------------------ |
|      | ZThead content (`z-tr`). |
